description:
The PlayStation 5 is still a relatively new console, but there are already some great racing games available for it. Here are some of the best racing games for PS5 in no particular order:

1. Gran Turismo 7 - This highly anticipated racing game features realistic graphics and physics, a large car roster, and a variety of tracks to race on.

2. Ratchet & Clank: Rift Apart - While not a traditional racing game, this platformer features sections where you can race through levels and compete for the best time.

3. WRC 10 - This rally racing game features licensed cars and tracks from the World Rally Championship, improved physics and graphics, and a new historic mode that lets you drive classic cars.

4. F1 2021 - This Formula One racing game allows you to create your own F1 team, compete in races, and manage your team's finances and strategy.

5. Dirt 5 - This off-road racing game features a range of vehicles, including rally cars, trucks, and buggies, and offers multiple game modes, including a career mode and online multiplayer.
name: ps5 racing games
